parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: From eucharistos; to be grateful, i.e. to express gratitude; specially, to say grace at a meal.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
Ruler of all, ruler of the universe, the almighty. From pas and kratos; the all-ruling, i.e. God.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Vocative Masculine Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Large, great, in the widest sense.
From dunamai; force; specially, miraculous power.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I rule, reign, (b) I reign over. From basileus; to rule.
